mapper.select: SELECT cp.*, p.prdInfoImg, p.mcId, p.prdName, p.prdPrice FROM comm_posts cp LEFT JOIN product p ON cp.prdNo = p.prdNo WHERE cp.postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comm_posts (postTitle, postDetail, postImg, score, memId, commCtgId, prdNo) VALUES(#{postTitle},#{postDetail},#{postImg},#{score},#{memId},#{commCtgId},#{prdNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE comm_posts SET postTitle = #{postTitle}, postDetail = #{postDetail}, postImg = CASE WHEN #{postImg} IS NOT NULL THEN #{postImg} ELSE postImg END WHERE postNo = #{postNo}
